sourcesContent: import _slicedToArray from"@babel/runtime/helpers/slicedToArray";import React from"react";import{useAnnotation}from"../../../hooks";import{TOOLS_IDS}from"../../../utils/constants";import AnnotationOptions from"../../common/AnnotationOptions";import{polygonOptionsPopupComponents,POLYGON_POPPABLE_OPTIONS}from"./Polygon.constants";var PolygonOptions=function(a){var b=a.t,c=useAnnotation({name:TOOLS_IDS.POLYGON}),d=_slicedToArray(c,2),e=d[0],f=d[1];return React.createElement(AnnotationOptions,{className:"FIE_polygon-tool-options",morePoppableOptionsPrepended:POLYGON_POPPABLE_OPTIONS,moreOptionsPopupComponentsObj:polygonOptionsPopupComponents,annotation:e,updateAnnotation:f,t:b,hidePositionField:!0})};export default PolygonOptions;
